alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Marshall; Panola; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, east central Tunica, Tate, north central Panola and southeastern Shelby Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 729 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Southaven to Hernando to near Phillipp. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Collierville, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Senatobia, Memphis, Coldwater, Byhalia, Como, Mt Pleasant, Eudora, Lewisburg, Arkabutla, Red Banks, Barr, Phillipp, Southeast Memphis, Independence and Marianna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
